name: Interstealther
description: You use A and D to move left and right, W to jump, S to crouch, and left click to shoot. While playing a level you can press ESC to pause/resume the game. There are powerups that you can pick up around the map that can provide you with temporary infinite ammo, a shield, or one more bullet. Defeat the enemies and reach the flag at the end of the level to complete it.
